pr_title: KEYCLOAK-12102 Show proper error messages in new account console

timeline.message:
KEYCLOAK-12102 Show proper error messages in new account console

Previously error codes were not properly translated in the account theme.

timeline.author: ssilvert

replies.bodyText: Hmm.  Looks like optional chaining is not available until TypeScript 3.7 and we are still on 3.3.  Maybe not such a good idea to upgrade this close to the release.
replies.author: ssilvert
